successes.title: One Fast Cat - Exercise Wheel
successes.description: House cats possess a natural hunting instinct, and this product helps them expend that pent up energy. It's an exercise wheel for cats!

Pledges.description: Receive a thank you note from One Fast Cat Team, plus behind-the-scenes updates on progress and future product releases.

Receive an electronic thank you note from the One Fast Cat Team, plus behind-the-scenes updates on progress and future product releases. Now open to international backers! We'll notify you when the wheel is ready to be purchased for international shipping.
Receive one of the first wheels off the production line: the first 25 backers get the wheel for this great price.
Be among the first to receive your One Fast Cat Exercise Wheel: introductory price for Kickstarter backers. The price will go up once this campaign ends.
Get a One Fast Cat Exercise Wheel with a red, blue, or green colored traction pad for your cat. Roll in style while coordinating colors in your home!

ALASKA & HAWAII: This pledge amount includes an $87 up-charge for shipping to backers in ALASKA and HAWAII. Get a One Fast Cat Exercise Wheel with a black, blue, green, or red colored traction pad for your cat.
Two Cat Wheels, delivered to your door. Again this is a special introductory price for our Kickstarter Backer community.
Two Cat Wheels delivered to your home! The price will go up once this campaign ends. Black, red, blue, and green colored traction pad is available and can be chosen upon campaign completion.

Three Cat Wheels delivered to your home! This reward would be great for families with many cats or individuals looking purchase with a friend and spend $183 per wheel. Black, red, blue, and green colored traction pads available, and can be chosen upon campaign completion.
